author: Anthony Spadafora
title: This Chrome extension can help protect you from the worst online threats
description: Check Point has released a new Chrome extension to help users safely browse the web and work online securely.
content:
Check Point has launched a new extension for Google Chrome called ZoneAlarm Web Secure Free that provides users with free protection against phishing attacks, malicious downloads and dangerous websites.
The new solution is an advanced Google Chrome extension… [+2114 chars]
